text: Bedingham is a village and civil parish in the South Norfolk district of Norfolk, England, about 11 miles (18 km) south of Norwich. According to the 2001 census it had a population of 216, increasing to 221 at the 2011 census. The church of Bedingham St Andrew is one of 124 existing round-tower churches in Norfolk. ==References== ==External links== *Website with photos of Bedingham St Andrew, a round-tower church * https://web.archive.org/web/20080828222324/http://www.south- norfolk.gov.uk/democracy/bedingham_parish.asp Category:Villages in Norfolk Category:Civil parishes in Norfolk
title: Bedingham
